definition: study hard and every day you will improve (idiom)
pinyin: hao3 hao3 xue2 xi2 , tian1 tian1 xiang4 shang4

definition: Study Times, journal of the Central Party School 中央黨校|中央党校[Zhong1 yang1 Dang3 xiao4]

sentences.english: Full-time study form, system for three years.
sentences.chinese: 全日制學習形式，學制三年。

sentences.english: The principal must be hard-working, good at learning and enterprising.
sentences.chinese: 校長必須是一個勤奮學習，善於學習，勇於進取的人。

sentences.english: The principal must be hard-working, good at learning and enterprising.
sentences.chinese: 校長必須是一個勤奮學習，善於學習，勇於進取的人。

sentences.english: I'm studying how to play with a yo-yo.
sentences.chinese: 我正在學習如何玩溜溜球。

sentences.english: Learning how to striptease is not difficult.
sentences.chinese: 學習跳脫衣舞十分容易。

sentences.english: The study used self-regulatory cycle to build the Self-regulated learning doctrine in WebQuest Learning system.
sentences.chinese: 開發具自律學習輔助機制之網路探究學習系統。

sentences.english: The study used self-regulatory cycle to build the Self-regulated learning doctrine in WebQuest Learning system.
sentences.chinese: 開發具自律學習輔助機制之網路探究學習系統。

sentences.english: Christian dedication and faithfulness in worshiping, studying the Word, receiving the sacrament.
sentences.chinese: 在做禮拜，學習聖經，領聖餐時基督徒的奉獻和忠誠。

sentences.english: Demonstrate ability to diagnose and discuss the etiologies of vesicular and bullous skin lesions.
sentences.chinese: 學習診斷及探討水皰及大皰皮膚病變之病因。

sentences.english: Make sure that the room you're studying in is not too cold or too warm.
sentences.chinese: 確保學習的房間不要太冷或太溫暖。

sentences.english: There are so many students play with me, and I always do well in study.
sentences.chinese: 有很多學生陪我玩，我學習很好。

sentences.english: I will start from their own, the Japanese learn their advantages.
sentences.chinese: 我也會從個人做起，向日本人學習他們的優點。

sentences.english: In his view, Posey is still learning the team's offensive and defensive tactics.
sentences.chinese: 他認爲，波西還在學習球隊的攻防戰術。

sentences.english: Here is the best system for note-taking and studying I've discovered so far.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有一種最佳的聽課記筆記學習系統，據我所知。

sentences.english: One must learn by doing in stages, and advancing those things that work.
sentences.chinese: 人們必須在實踐中學習，再進一步讓過程工作的更好。

sentences.english: We all know we must study hard!
sentences.chinese: 我們都知道我們必須把學習搞好。

definition: to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
to read a book/to study/to attend school
specialty/specialized field/main field of study (at university)/major/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]/professional
student/member of an institution of learning/officer cadet
